Articles.Content:
So I'm considering rebalancing the tech tree for personal use, or at least getting a sort of 'preview' so if I stay stock I can plan which unlocks to use/avoid.

Is there a list somewhere of all the unlocks/parts stored in each? Going through the .cfgs one by one to figure this out is taking forever.

it isnt really clear to me, but it lists the parts it unlocks and i bet thats enough if you want to mod it.

http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Tech_tree
Hm. This is close but I was hoping for more of a visual map. Still, I guess this might kinda work...
